Profile   
 
Finance Director  with 18 years of solid & diverse finance experience  with proven track record covering

 Professional Experience   
 
Brimore  
 
Finance Director             Jan 2022- Present   
 
▪ Co-Creat e the Organization strategy with the Leadership team . 
▪ Play a key role within the management team in steering business decisions.   
▪ Building a Finance department from scratch . 
▪ Establish the monthly closing process , forecasting  and build the annual budget.  
▪ Support in Investment fund raising and financial statement  reporting  with key analysis and insights o n a 
quarterly basis.  
▪ Co-create the Financial modelling based on growth and profitability  assumptions  in line with business 
strategy.  
▪ Lead the value creation workstreams  to optimize on cost and drive towards efficiencies . 
 
 
Mars Incorporated                      May 2007 - Dec 2021  
  
Senior Distributors  Markets Regional Finance Manag er              OCT 2019 – Dec2021  
 
▪ Act as the CFO for the cluster, m anaging more than 10 markets across North Africa , Levant  & 
Mediterranean  cluster  operating model , geographically spread across 3 continents . 
▪ Drive profitable growth by partnering with the Regional director , steering the team to deliver on short & 
long term  targets . 
▪ Provide insights to enable  tradeoffs with clear criteria to ensure optimal profitability a nd ROI . Also 
promote the Value creation mindset and use to drive efficiencies and protect bottom line.  
▪ Build and Maintain  strong relationship with our mutual partners “Distributors”  
▪ Manage Trade spend budget through c opilot ing Strategic Revenue management, trade investment 
governance, reconciliation of Trade spend with the Distributors to comply with approved budgets.  
▪ Manage and Co -Own Customer/Distributors P&L, channel and top accoun ts P&Ls to ensure Optimal Sales 
and profit delivery . 
▪ Lead and embed the governance mindset across the Cluster as well as our distributors.  
▪ Lead Financial reporting and closing  ensuring the accuracy of results and use to drive timely action.  
▪ Permanent member of the cluster D MR (Demand Management Review)  and IR (Integrated 
Reconciliation) , both part of the S&OP+ process.  
 
 
Internal  Egypt, Libya and Sudan Finance Manager             Nov 201 7–Oct 2019  
   
▪ Improved the cluster profit margin  year-on-year by building the profitable growth mindset, driving 
efficiencies, solid budget management and ensuring healthy ROI to our investments.  
▪ Lead the sales finance supporting the Sales  and market directors in a transversal model where expertise 
is provided to the sales function . 
▪ Copilot Strategic Revenue management, trade investment governance, reconciliation of Trade spend with 
the Distributors to comply with approved budgets.  
▪ Develop the Operating Plan target of trade by Market/Account and distributor where relevant.  
▪ Manage and Co -Own Customer/Distributors P&L, channel and top accounts P&Ls to ensure Optimal Sales 
and profit delivery . 
▪ S&OP contribution with copiloting and p ermanent mem ber of the clusters D MR (Demand Management 
Review)  and IR (Integrated Reconciliation).  
▪ Provide insights to make tradeoffs with clear criteria’s to ensure optimal earning contribution and ROI .
